'use strict';

/**
* {{MODULE_DESC}}
*
* @module @{{PKG}}
*
* @example
* var uniform = require( '@stdlib/random/iter/uniform' );
* var {{ALIAS}} = require( '@{{PKG}}' );
*
* var iter = {{ALIAS}}( uniform( {{RAND_MIN}}, {{RAND_MAX}} ) );
*
* var v = iter.next().value;
* // returns <number>
*
* v = iter.next().value;
* // returns <number>
*
* v = iter.next().value;
* // returns <number>
*
* // ...
*/

// MODULES //

var iterator = require( './main.js' );


// EXPORTS //

module.exports = iterator;
